author: Play On Tabletop
description:
Super Fun Game where two of our video editors play the game they edit! Nick has some special announcements in this video too!  We will be bringing King of the Colosseum, the format you saw in the video today, to Las Vegas, Swizterland, and Kansas City.

HEROFEST in Bern October 3-5 https://herofest.ch/
Nick and Ben from Play On are going to Switzerland! They will be doing three shows in front of a live audience there. 
VIP Tickets for Friday: https://merch.playontabletop.com/products/hero-fest-vip-ticket-oct-3
VIP Tickets for Sat: https://merch.playontabletop.com/products/hero-fest-vip-ticket-oct-4
VIP Tickets for Sun: https://merch.playontabletop.com/products/hero-fest-vip-ticket-oct-5

You will need a convention ticket as well and you can use code: HEF25POT for 20% off!

Special thank you to Hoppy Dice Tactics (https://hoppydicetactics.ch/en/) and DieSpieler (https://diespieler.ch/en) for doing Demo Games of King of the Colosseum and selling our merch at HeroFest!

LAS VEGAS OPEN Oc
title: Video Editors Try Warhammer 40,000 for the First Time!
